EmailTemplate.description: Email that goes to a Lead where Trailhead or SFDC Cert info is not entered on the web form
EmailTemplate.name: Lead missing Trailhead or SFDC Cert info
EmailTemplate.subject: Can we get some additional information?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in 10K Advisors. The form you submitted did not include your Salesforce verification email address or your Trailhead Profile Link. Please click on this link and enter the information so we can move forward with next steps in our qualification process. Thank you and we look forward to hearing from you. 10K Advisors Leadership Team
